guide.conclusion: I used metal, 1/2 inch electric conduit and 12 inch wheels, but have upgraded to 16' wheels, then finally 20" wheels. Conduit was bent using a standard hand tubing bender. Floor is light gage aluminum, sides are 1/4 inch plywood. The kids have added a tailgate and lots of bungee cords.
